entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Rain beginning in the morning. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 5 May 2023
